(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP (NNS Thanks))
    (PP (IN for)
      (NP (DT the) (JJ enthusiastic) (NN support)))
    (. .)))


root(ROOT-0, Thanks-1)
prep(Thanks-1, for-2)
det(support-5, the-3)
amod(support-5, enthusiastic-4)
pobj(for-2, support-5)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP You))
    (VP (MD can)
      (ADVP (RB still))
      (VP (VB write)
        (PRT (RP in))
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB be)
              (VP (VBN placed)
                (PP (IN on)
                  (NP (DT the) (VBG waiting) (NN list)))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(write-4, You-1)
aux(write-4, can-2)
advmod(write-4, still-3)
root(ROOT-0, write-4)
prt(write-4, in-5)
aux(placed-8, to-6)
auxpass(placed-8, be-7)
xcomp(write-4, placed-8)
prep(placed-8, on-9)
det(list-12, the-10)
amod(list-12, waiting-11)
pobj(on-9, list-12)
